root.name: Prisoner of Ice
root.description: Prisoner of Ice tells the story of Lieutenant Ryan, an American agent stationed aboard the submarine H.M.S. Victoria on a rescue mission to the Antarctic. During the course of the rescue of Bjorn Hamsun, the Victoria picks up two mysterious crates that reek of evil. The contents of these crates set into action a sequence of events that take you across many locations and even through time itself.

similar_games.game: Call of Cthulhu: Shadow of the Comet
